transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji didi.
Customer: Abhi aawaz aa rahi hai sir?
Executive: Ji mam.
Customer: Main aapko ye bolti hu sir ki aapka jo flow wagera bhi check kiya tha, sari inquiry ka part bhi check kiya, by lead aap use kar rahe hain, sab kuch perfect hai. India mart pe jo leads ka flow aa raha hai na sir wo sara aapko mil raha hai. Agar jo lead aap nahi utha pate hain wo aapko past lead me show ho jata hai.
Customer: Wo aapne check kiya tha na last time?
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Aap ek bar open kariye by leads me jaaiye.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: By leads me jate hain to wahi apna right hand side me niche past lead ka option aata hai us pe click kariye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Past lead me check kariye jo bhi lead miss ho rahi hai wo yaha pe aapko show hongi.
Customer: But wahi bol raha hu ki mujhe aayi nahi notification nahi hai mere pass miss ho gayi hai.
Customer: Kya bol rahe hain?
Customer: Pehle kya karta tha pehle kya hota tha jaise jo bhi mere product line hai unki jo lead aati thi uska notification mere ko deta tha.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Abhi wo na notifications aa rahe hain na ye lead kab aayi pata nahi chal raha hai ye lead fir expire ho ja rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi sir aisa nahi hai dekhiye notification ek bar aap settings me jaaiye apna.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Settings me jane ke baad upar hi notification setting pehla hi option hota hai us pe click kariye.
Customer: Kar diya maine.
Executive: Ji yaha pe thoda sa niche scroll karenge to ek by lead alert ka option aata hai by lead alert.
Executive: To aapka wo already on hi hai right to jo bhi acha ha maine aapko ek cheez aur batai thi sir.
Executive: Ki agar aapke pass jo mail ke mail alerts aate hain na agar us pe se aap lead use nahi kar rahe hain to uska wo flow fir frequency kam hone lagti hai mails ki. To aapke pass jo bhi alert
Customer: Nahi sir galat wali baat nahi hai ye pehle na hum log har mail share karte the right lekin uske baad jab hamare pass feedback aaya ki clients matlab jo jo supplier hai wo itna jyada usage hi nahi kar pa rahe mail ke through to hum logo ne sirf usko mail ka flow dena shuru hua jo actually use kar rahe hain mails ke through.
Executive: To wo us cheez pe aap thoda focus kariye ki jo bhi mail pe alert aa raha hai by lead ka wo aap use kar rahe hain.
Customer: Exactly.
Executive: Thik hai to uska flow proper aayega aapke pass usme koi problem nahi hai.
Customer: Okay okay okay okay okay.
Executive: Thik hai baki past lead ka jo option hai usme aap sab pe I am interested mark kariye sir.
Customer: Wo to kar hi raha hu main.
Executive: Haan wo aap kar hi rahe hain baki reply aapke perfect.
Customer: Haan wo India mart sales ke liye bhi wo deta kya hai classes wagera how to gain sales.

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello hello
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving lead notifications.

- Leads are expiring without customer's knowledge.



Resolution:

- Executive checked customer's account and settings.

- Executive advised checking notification settings.

- Executive explained the importance of using mail alerts.

- Executive advised marking "I am interested" on past leads.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, notifications, settings, mail alerts
